author: CDR Kerchner
title: Obama Long-Form “Rediscovered” as a Forgery
text:
(Oct. 24, 2024) — On Tuesday a video was uploaded to Rumble by “The Liberty Daily” depicting an apparent computer graphics technician detailing how he found the “long-form” birth certificate image posted by the Obama White House in 2011 to be a forgery, echoing the findings of then-Maricopa County, AZ Sheriff Joseph Arpaio and his lead investigator on the case, Mike Zullo.
Various commenters to the video remarked it was “old news” but nevertheless important even nearly eight years after Zullo’s investigation, begun in August 2011 with Arpaio’s authorization, concluded, reinforcing its original findings that the image posted at whitehouse.gov on April 27, 2011 is a “computer-generated forgery.”
“I’m a professional designer…” the speaker in the video states. “I do this all the time. I’ve done photo editings; this is insane…I gotta show you this.”
“I’m downloading it right now…I’ve done this a few times now at this point…I can’t even believe this is real,” he said, proceeding to open the image in (Adobe) Illustrator.
“There’s bounding boxes on here, so you can delete the bounding boxes in Illustrator, and if you delete them, you can move the entire background document off of the page, and you can literally separate it, and you can see that this is the original document with the original text on it, that this has been completely photo-edited and they put this ghosting effect on here…I can’t even believe this…even the background’s been edited…,” he said. “This is from the White House’s website!”

author: Staff
title: America WON'T Last Much Longer if Men Don't Do THIS | Glenn Beck at Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0
text: Will America survive the 2024 election? As sides are being drawn, many men want to be the heroes that they believe will save this nation. But all true heroes, Glenn Beck says, have one thing in common: They didn't want to be heroes. They were afraid just like the rest of us. But they put aside that fear, surrendered to God, and did what was right. THAT is the kind of hero America needs: one of character, humility, and integrity. One who will stand for the TRUTH and teach it to his children, no matter what the culture says. In his speech at Jason Whitlock's "Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0" event, Glenn tells the stories of 2 heroes. One, George Washington, is well known. But many today don't know the true reason that men followed him into battle. The other, Raoul Wallenberg, few Americans have heard of. But his story of heroism during World War II brought Glenn to tears. Heroes: they’re all around us," Glenn declares. “This is OUR time. This is YOUR call.” To watch the ENTIRE Fearless Army Roll Call 2.0 event, sign up at https://BlazeTV.com/Glenn for exclusive access. Will America survive the 2024 election? author: Laura Almaraz
title: Clima CDMX: Se esperan heladas para el amanecer de hoy 3 de enero
text:
Frío y heladas en distintas alcaldías de la CDMX marcarán el amanecer de hoy 3 de enero, de acuerdo a los pronósticos del clima difundidos por la Secretaría de Gestión Integral de Riesgos y Protección Civil en la capital mexicana.
Varias alcaldías tienen activa la Alerta Amarilla y la Alerta Naranja, por lo que es necesario que no dejes de protegerte ante estas bajas temperaturas que se caracterizarán en su mayoría por fuertes heladas.
No te dejes engañar, porque aunque el clima sea un poco más cálido a media tarde en los pronósticos, las temperaturas seguirán siendo bajas al menos en estos primeros días de enero.
No te alarmes, conoce todos los detalles
Mi Beca para Empezar: Estos alumnos ya no recibirán sus pagos a partir de enero de 2025
Clima en la CDMX por horas
Las temperaturas mínimas para hoy 3 de enero del 2025 en la CDMX, serán de hasta 1 grado como mínimas y las máximas entre 18 y 20 grados.
La Alerta Naranja se activó en las siguientes alcaldías, en donde se registrarán mínimas de entre 1 y 3 grados, además de heladas:
- Cuajimalpa
- Milpa Alta
- Tlalpan
- Tlalpan
Mientras que la Alerta Amarilla se activa en estas alcaldías en donde se registrarán temperaturas mínimas entre los 4 y los 6 grados:
- Álvaro Obregón
- Coyoacán
- La Magdalena Contreras
- Miguel Hidalgo
- Tláhuac
- Xochimilco
